name: Door 4
description:
I am creating a game, right? And I want to release the prototypes of the game and get paid at the same time. I decided that I would just bring it here for you guys to try out. 

The current status of the game isn't the greatest, I finally got collisions to work correctly and things to work. However, I have one thing that you can do in this game, which is the main objective: eliminate all the frogs. 

There is no  "you win" when you do it, but it's the thought that counts. Also, the frogs tend to fall out of the map, so that's fun!
